body.name: Ninja DZ201 Foodi 8 Quart 6-in-1 DualZone 2-Basket Air Fryer with 2 Independent Frying Baskets, Match Cook & Smart Finish to Roast, Broil, Dehydrate & More for Quick, Easy Meals, Grey
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by DiscountsJungle.
features: 2 INDEPENDENT BASKETS: The original Air Fryer with 2 independent baskets, the XL air fryer lets you cook 2 foods, 2 ways, at the same time, eliminating back-to-back cooking like a traditional single-basket air fryer.

SMART FINISH & MATCH COOK: DualZone Technology allows you to choose between the Smart Finish feature, which unlocks cooking 2 foods 2 ways that finish at the same time, and the and a Match Cook button to easily copy settings across zones for full 8-qt capacity.
6-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Includes 6 versatile cooking programs: Air Fry, Air Broil, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate. The baskets can be washed in the dishwasher or by hand.
XL CAPACITY: The 8-quart air fryer capacity lets you fit mains and sides at the same time for making quick family meals, or up to 4 lbs. of French fries or chicken wings.
SEPARATE HEATING ZONES: 2 independent 4-quart zones have their own cooking baskets, cyclonic fans, and rapid heaters.
EASY CLEANING: Easy-to-clean baskets and dishwasher-safe crisper plates.
LESS FAT: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE: 105°F to 450°F allows you to gently remove moisture from foods or quickly cook and crisp foods with convection heat.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: DualZone Air Fryer, (2) 4 Quart Baskets, (2) Nonstick Crisper Plates, 15 Recipes, Additional Meal Options & Cooking Charts.
body.description: The Ninja Foodi 6-in-1 8-qt. 2-Basket Air Fryer with Dual Zone Technology. The first air fryer with 2 independent baskets that let you cook 2 foods at once, not back-to-back like a traditional single-basket air fryer. Dual Zone Technology's Smart Finish feature intelligently manages to cook so both foods finish at the same time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DualZone Technology Use Match Cook to easily copy settings across zones or Smart Finish to cook 2 foods, 2 ways, and finish at the same time.

Smart Finish Intelligently syncs cook times in each zone so different foods can still finish at the same time. Match Cook Easily sync settings across both zones to double the capacity for your favorite guilt-free fried foods. 8 Quart Capacity Cook mains and sides at the same time for quick family meals.

Air Fry Get crispy golden textures on all of your fried favorites with up to 75% less fat* versus traditional frying methods. Roast Make hearty casseroles, roasted veggies, and more. Air Broil Cook all your favorite proteins with ease. Dehydrate Gently remove moisture from ingredients to make homemade dried fruits, veggie chips, and jerky. Bake Whip up fluffy baked goods for any occasion. Reheat Reheat leftovers with even temperatures throughout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best air fryer!
reviews.reviewText: The Ninja DZ201 Foodi 8 Quart 6-in-1 DualZone 2-Basket Air Fryer has transformed our meal prep, making it a breeze to whip up quick and delicious dishes. The 8-quart capacity is perfect for feeding a family, and the dual-zone feature with two independent frying baskets adds incredible flexibility to our cooking routine. The Match Cook and Smart Finish options take the guesswork out of achieving perfectly roasted, broiled, or dehydrated meals. The sleek grey design adds a modern touch to our kitchen, and the ease of use makes it a go-to appliance for weeknight dinners. With its versatility and efficiency, the Ninja DZ201 has earned its spot as a kitchen essential for creating tasty and hassle-free meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down, best air fryer on the market
reviews.reviewText: Nothing is harder to do than cleaning the "Old Style" air fryer. One thing i absolutely hated to, so i rarely used it.So when i was in the market for a new one, i made sure to read ALL of the reviews for features i wanted. One of them was ease of cleaning.This one has removable grates for each removable basket. All you do is take it out, wash it off and wipe out the bottom of the basket and done! it doesn't get any easier than that. The non stick coating is so nice, nothing really sticks at all.I am also a fan of the duel temperature zones. You can cook 2 things on different temps if needed. IT works super fast. What normally took 15 minutes in my old one, only took 6 in this one. You can also Roast, Bake or Dehydrate in this guy. Not your average air fryer.I normally do tons of research before i buy an appliance. I didn't want to buy this just for the Ninja Foodi name. It just ended up being the one that fit my needs , price was right only $119.00 and i picked it for the basket size as well. they have ones that come with larger or smaller baskets.It comes with a quick start guide, it is not super complicated to use the first time. You do not have to sit and read it in its entirety in order to know what to do. It comes with multiple pages of cooking charts so you have an easy reference to do whatever task right at your finger tips.I promise, you will not be disappointed with any of the Ninja Foodi Air Fryers, whichever you choose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around excellent product
reviews.reviewText: The Ninja DZ201 Foodi 8 Quart Air fryer is my first experience with air fryers so I was apprehensive before using it. But it turns out to be the most user friendly appliance in the house. After just a few times I was confident nothing would blow up or burn. :) The machine, baskets and grates are top notch and so very easy to clean. The controls and functions made sense right away. Food comes out amazingly flavorful. Roasted veggies and potatoes are superb. Salmon is beyond superb. One of the surprises is not having anywhere near the left-over cooking odors in the house that you get from pan frying, searing or oven baking. This is a quality product I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Culinary Versatility and Odor-Free Delight
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)The dual-basket air fryer has become the kitchen gadget that I never knew I needed. With its innovative design featuring two separate baskets and the ability to cook without flavors mixing, it has transformed the way I approach meal preparation. Here's why I'm thrilled with this air fryer:Double the Convenience: ★★★★★ (5/5)The standout feature of this air fryer is its dual-basket design. Having two separate baskets means you can cook two different dishes simultaneously without worrying about flavors intermingling. It's a game-changer for multitasking in the kitchen and accommodating diverse culinary preferences in one go.Odor-Free Cooking: ★★★★★ (5/5)Another remarkable aspect of this air fryer is its ability to cook without odors mixing. You can fry up crispy chicken in one basket and bake a fragrant dessert in the other without any flavor crossover. This feature ensures that your dishes maintain their distinct flavors.Matchcooking Magic: ★★★★★ (5/5)The matchcooking capability of this air fryer is a real treat. It allows you to synchronize cooking times and temperatures for both baskets, ensuring that everything finishes simultaneously. No more juggling multiple cooking appliances or dealing with unevenly timed dishes.Healthy Cooking: ★★★★★ (5/5)As with all air fryers, this one offers a healthier cooking alternative by using minimal oil to achieve that coveted crispy texture. It's perfect for those looking to enjoy their favorite fried foods with less guilt.User-Friendly: ★★★★★ (5/5)This air fryer is incredibly user-friendly. The intuitive controls and digital display make it easy to select cooking times, temperatures, and modes. It also comes with pre-programmed settings for popular dishes, simplifying the cooking process.Spacious Baskets: ★★★★★ (5/5)Both baskets offer ample cooking space, allowing you to prepare larger quantities of food. Whether you're cooking for a family dinner or a small gathering, you'll appreciate the capacity of this air fryer.Easy to Clean: ★★★★★ (5/5)Cleaning this air fryer is a breeze. The removable baskets and non-stick surfaces make cleanup quick and hassle-free. You can spend more time enjoying your meal and less time scrubbing dishes.Value for Money: ★★★★★ (5/5)Considering its innovative design, odor-free cooking, matchcooking capabilities, and user-friendly features, this dual-basket air fryer offers exceptional value for money. It's an investment that simplifies meal preparation and enhances your culinary creativity.In conclusion, the dual-basket air fryer has revolutionized my kitchen experience. Its ability to cook without flavors mixing and its matchcooking function provide unmatched convenience and versatility. If you're a culinary enthusiast or simply someone who enjoys a hassle-free cooking experience, this air fryer is a must-have. It's an appliance that empowers you to explore new culinary horizons while maintaining the distinct flavors of your dishes. With its innovative design and user-friendly features, it's a culinary companion that I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone looking to elevate their cooking game.
Me encantó!Muy buen producto, fácil de usar y práctico.Llego a tiempo y en excelente condiciones.No te vas arrepentir de adquirirlo
Great product and saves time in cooking. Especially love to cook with this in the summer as it doesn't heat up our house like our oven did. Really good to heat up leftovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil de limpiar y buen desempeño

reviews.reviewText: This is my first time buying an Air Fryer. It definitely lives up to its reputation. The Ninja Air Fryer is easy to use and not only does it fry up crunchy French fries...it even reheats pizza so the crust is nice and crunchy and the cheese melted! :) We love it!
